biotools.summary:
Displaying genome-wide association summary statistics with multiple annotation layers.

A useful way to summarize genome-wide association data is with a Manhattan plot. This type of plot has a point for every SNP or location tested with the position in the genome along the x-axis and the -log10 p-value on the y-axis

bioschemas.name: Manhattan
